column4: hello guys I have a problem here. In terminal When I gain root access for the first time I'll be prompted for the password. But if I reopen terminal and type "sudo ..." I wont be prompted to enter password. Same problem with other applications requiring root access. How to disable this
sudo will cache password for 15 min by default
I want to disable that feature, how to disable that
proebaly tweaking /etc/sudoers. check man page « man sudoers »
